text: kya tum logon ne is par gaur nahin kiya ki jo kuchh aasamaanon mein hai aur jo kuchh zameen mein hai (garaz sab kuchh) khuda hee ne yaqeenee tumhaara taabee kar diya hai aur tum par apanee zaahiree aur baatinee neamaten pooree kar deen aur baaz log (nusar bin haaris vagairah) aise bhee hain jo (khvaah ma khvaah) khuda ke baare mein jhagadate hain (haaloki unake paas) na ilm hai aur na hidaayat hai aur na koee raushan kitaab hai
